content: eyelet accent scarf version 2 6may2025 supplies yarn tosh merino light or fingering weight yarn needles us 4 3 5 mm stitch marker to note front side of work abbreviations slwyf slip_stitch with yarn in front kfb knit front back 1 stitch increase kfbf knit front back front 2 stitch increase k2tog knit two stitches together 1 stitch decrease k3tog knit three stitches together 2 stitch decrease k knit yo yarn over directions eyelet stitch row 1 sl1wyf kfb k2 *yo yo cast on 5 stitches k2tog k1* until last 4 stitches k1 k2tog k1 eyelet stitch row 2 sl1wyf k to end - note knit increase section pattern into first yo drop second yo garter stitch row 1 sl1wyf kfbf k until last 3 stitches k2tog k1 continue in straight section pattern until work garter stitch row 2 sl1wyf k to end measure approximately 62 inches or desired length have about 21-23 grams of yarn left to repeat row 1 and 2 for a total of 11 times 16 complete the decrease pattern section stiches on needle decrease pattern section eyelet stitch row 1 sl1wyf kfbf k1 *yo yo garter stitch row 1 sl1wyf kfb k until last 4 st k2tog k1* until last 4 stitches k1 k2tog k1 k3tog k1 eyelet stitch row 2 sl1wyf k to end - note knit garter stitch row 2 sl1wyf k to end into first yo drop second yo 17 stitches on repeat row 1 and 2 for a total of 11 times 42 needle stiches on needle repeat increase section pattern for a total of 4 eyelet stitch row 1 sl1wyf kfb *yo yo k2tog times k1* until last 4 stitches k3tog k1 stitches on needle after eyelet stitch row 2 sl1wyf k to end 41 stitches increase section repeat 1 17 stitches on needle increase section repeat 2 29 stitches increase section repeat 3 41 stitches repeat decrease section pattern for a total of 4 increase section repeat 4 53 stitches times stitches on needle after straight section pattern the pattern repeats decrease section repeat 1 41 stitches every 24 row decrease section repeat 2 29 stitches decrease section repeat 3 17 stitches garter stitch row 1 sl1wyf kfb k until last 3 st decrease section repeat 4 5 stitches k2tog k1 bind o cid 431 remaining stitches weave in ends garter stitch row 2 sl1wyf k to end repeat row 1 and 2 for a total of 11 times block scarf using wet block steam block or spray block method change log 6may2025 decrease section these was an extra k in the eyelet section eyelet stitch row 1 sl1wyf kfb k1 *yo yo k2tog k1* until last 4 stitches k3tog k1 eyelet stitch row 2 sl1wyf k to end 41 stitches on needle
